title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Situational Interest Among High School Students via Collaborative Citizen Science Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform scientific experimental techniques via eDNA analysis procedures with over 80% accuracy
Learners can resolve at least three problems encountered during data collection/analysis processes through peer collaboration
Learners can explain at least three ways in which participation in scientific research contributes to solving social issues
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
